title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta.
Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: Spices: garam masala, cumin, paprika, chili powder
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt, then grill or pan-fry until cooked.
Sauté onion and garlic in butter until soft.
Stir in cream and spices to make a smooth sauce.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and cook for 5–10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A healthy and simple breakfast made with toasted bread and fresh avocado slices.
ingredients: Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, poached egg, chili flakes
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden brown.
Mash avocado with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Top with optional extras like tomatoes or egg.
